DOC.brief_summary: Two-year multicentre randomize control parallel trial compare intentional delivery conservative management pregnant woman preterm prelabour rupture membrane 32 35 week . The purpose study determine whether intentional delivery woman PPROM 32 35 week 's gestation decrease overall neonatal morbidity associate PPROM-related complication without increase morbidity associate shortened pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Intentional Delivery Women With Preterm Prelabour Rupture Membranes
